Package rlee348.menu

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
rlee348.menu.MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class MainMenu
extends processing.core.PApplet
Draws the menu screen for the program, Displays credits and instructions to the game, has different buttons to indicate class choice. Also has volume slider and max fps slider.
Author:
Ryan Lee

      public void update​(int x, int y)

      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the mouse.
      y - y coordinate of the mouse.

      public void mousePressed()

    • handleButtonEvents

      public void handleButtonEvents​(g4p_controls.GButton button, g4p_controls.GEvent event)
      This handles any events that have to do with the buttons. It takes into account mouse clicks on a specific button. The mage button will load you into the game as a mage. The knight button will load you into the game as a knight. The rogue button will load you into the game as a rogue.
      Parameters:
      button - Button used in interaction
      event - the event that happens.

    • handleSliderEvents

      public void handleSliderEvents​(g4p_controls.GValueControl slider, g4p_controls.GEvent event)
